alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Georgetown County through 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorms between Georgetown and Pawleys Island, moving east at 10 mph. Additional thunderstorms were intensifying from near Oatland to Plantersville. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu, Murrells Inlet, Plantersville, Graves, Oatland, and Litchfield Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, then consider seeking shelter inside a building.
